subject: Welcome to AI Azent!
preview: Get started with your AI Azent account.
body: Hello, Welcome to AI Azent. We're glad to have you as a part of our community!

subject: Upcoming Updates
body: We're thrilled to share exciting updates with you, including improved performance and new tools.

subject: Account Security Alert
body: Dear user, we noticed unusual activity in your account. Please review your recent login history.

subject: Exclusive Offer Just for You!
body: Enjoy an exclusive 20% discount on our premium features. Offer valid until January 15, 2025.

subject: Your Subscription Invoice
body: Thank you for subscribing to AI Azent Premium. Your payment of $49.99 has been processed successfully.

subject: Weekly Newsletter
body: Stay informed with our weekly newsletter featuring tips, news, and updates from AI Azent.

subject: Welcome Gift for New Users
body: Thank you for joining AI Azent. As a token of appreciation, claim your free eBook on AI trends.

subject: Scheduled Maintenance
body: We will perform scheduled maintenance on January 10, 2025, from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM UTC. Services may be unavailable.

subject: Reset Your Password
body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the link below to reset it securely.

subject: AI Workshop Invitation
body: You are invited to our AI workshop on January 20, 2025. Learn from industry experts and enhance your skills.

subject: Your Feedback Matters
body: We value your feedback. Please take a moment to share your thoughts and help us improve AI Azent.

subject: Year-End Summary
body: Here's a summary of your activity on AI Azent in 2024. Thank you for being a valuable user!
